title: Senior MLOps Engineer
summary: Highly experienced Senior MLOps Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining robust machine learning pipelines and infrastructure. Proven track record in deploying scalable ML models to production, optimizing model performance, and establishing CI/CD practices for AI solutions. Proficient in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), Kubernetes, Docker, and a wide range of ML frameworks and MLOps tools.

cloud: AWS (S3, EC2, EKS, SageMaker, Lambda, RDS, CloudWatch)

description: Led the design and implementation of scalable MLOps platforms on AWS, leveraging EKS for container orchestration and SageMaker for model training and deployment.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI for ML model lifecycle management, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Engineered a real-time feature store using Redis and Sagemaker Feature Store, improving data consistency and model inference latency.
Implemented robust monitoring and alerting systems for ML models in production using Prometheus, Grafana, and CloudWatch.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for MLOps, containerization, and cloud infrastructure.
Built and managed automated ML pipelines for data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using Airflow and Kubeflow.
Containerized ML applications using Docker and orchestrated deployments on GCP's GKE, ensuring high availability and scalability.
Developed custom logging and metric collection tools for tracking model performance and data drift.
Collaborated with data scientists and software engineers to transition experimental models into production environments.
Managed data versioning and model lineage using DVC and MLflow.
Designed and implemented ETL pipelines for various data sources using Python and SQL.
Assisted in maintaining data warehousing solutions and ensuring data quality.
Developed scripts for automating data ingestion and validation processes.
